name: Atutudes Circus Fun Tutu - As Seen On EtsyLush and Make It Mine Parties
description:
ALL PHOTOS AND DESIGNS ARE THE INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY OF ATUTUDES. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

Red, Orange, Green, Yellow and Blue Tulle featuring a Red Satin Polka Dot Bow. Available in sizes Newborn - 6. Let me know what size you need with your order.

Photos provided by the very talented Heather of Artistic Images By Heather.

* These are AVERAGE waist measurements.
* We always prefer an actual waist measurement, but the following measurements leave room for growth.

Newborn-12 months
Waist measures 15"-17"
Tutu Length is 7"

12 months-2 years
Waist measures 18"
Tutu length is 8"

2 years-3 years
Waist measures 19"
Tutu length is 10"

4 years
Waist measures 20"
Tutu length is 11"


5 years
Waist measures 21"
Tutu length is 12"

6 years
Waist measures 22"
Tutu length is 13"

name: Atutudes Breakfast At Tiffany's Tutu Dress  As Seen On Pinterest and LaurenConrad.com
description:
ALL PHOTOS AND DESIGNS ARE THE INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY OF ATUTUDES. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

Inspired by one of my favorite actresses, Audrey Hepburn in the iconic outfit inspired from the movie Breakfast At Tiffany's! A Tutu Dress made from Black Tulle featuring Black Tied Sleeves and Sash. We can make any custom size Newborn - 6. Let me know your size when you place your order.

As seen on Lauren Conrad's website on Friday Favorites! http://www.laurenconrad.com/post/friday-favorites-24

***This listing is for the dress only. Complete the look by accessorizing with a tiara (from Hobby Lobby), sunglasses (from Party City), a couple of strands of faux pearl mardi gras beads, and a rhinestone enhancer (from Stein Mart).

***Dress shown is knee-length. Additional upcharge for longer lengths.

Sizes larger than a 6 toddler will incur an upcharge for additional materials needed. Convo me for larger sizes.

These beautiful photos were provided by the talented Ashley at Ashley Concilio-Photography

*********************************************************
See our link to the right for current production time.

*********************************************************
Connect with us!
www.facebook.com/atutudes
www.twitter.com/atutudes

*********************************************************

name: Atutudes Pretty Peacock Tutu Dress
description:
ALL PHOTOS AND DESIGNS ARE THE INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY OF ATUTUDES. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

When I was a little girl, my mom used to have a vase of Peacock Feathers on her dresser. I thought they were so lovely! I adore the vibrant and shiny mixture of greens and blues. Your little princess will be the prettiest Peacock around! A Tutu Dress made from Royal, Teal, Turquoise, Kelly, & Navy Tulle featuring a Turquoise Satin Halter Tie, Removable Peacock and Crystal Feather Clip.

***Dress shown is knee-length. Additional upcharge for longer lengths.

Sizes larger than a 6 toddler will incur an upcharge for additional materials needed. Convo me for larger sizes.

***DRESS ONLY. Shown with Custom Peacock Hat from Lisa's Mini Mad Hattery

These beautiful bracelets are available at http://www.etsy.com/shop/theluckyelephant?ref=ss_profile

These beautiful photos were provided by the talented Amy at Bella Bliss Photography
http://www.facebook.com/home.php#!/bellablissphotography
